title: Devlapp
description:
🚀 Build Your Web App & Download the Code for FREE! 😲
Tired of app builders that don’t give you the code? Meet Devlapp!
💻 Drag, drop, add logic & download your app in Vue or React (Tailwind & TS)!
No limits, no vendor lock-in, just pure code freedom.
🔗 Check it out and start creating your app today! 
devlapp.com
